column2: an A.M. Eatery////Pancake flight--I was having a pancake of the day
column4: and a banana bread French toast. I would say the pancake themselves are the average pancake that we could have got in most brunch places. The banana bread French toast (drunken monkey something) was a good idea
column5: but using banana bread to make the French toast lost the crunch and chewy French toast flavor. In terms of the peach cobbler pancake
column6: the so called cream cheese filling did not stand out at all.
